MathNet.Numerics.Transformations.RealFourierTransformation Class Reference

The RealFourierTransformation provides algorithms for one, two and three dimensional fast fourier transformations (FFT) on real vectors.This class caches precomputations locally, thus consider reusing/caching it. More...

void TransformForward (double[] samples, out double[] fftReal, out double[] fftImag, params int[] dimensionLengths)
 Outplace Forward Transformation in multiple dimensions. Size must be Power of Two in each dimension. The Data is expected to be ordered such that the last index changes most rapidly (in 2D this means row-by-row when indexing as [y,x]).

TransformationConvention Convention [get, set]
 Fourier Transformation Convention.

Detailed Description

The RealFourierTransformation provides algorithms for one, two and three dimensional fast fourier transformations (FFT) on real vectors.

This class caches precomputations locally, thus consider reusing/caching it.

void MathNet.Numerics.Transformations.RealFourierTransformation.TransformBackward ( double[]  fftReal,
double[]  fftImag,
out double[]  samples,
params int[]  dimensionLengths 
)

Outplace Backward Transformation in multiple dimensions. Size must be Power of Two in each dimension. The Data is expected to be ordered such that the last index changes most rapidly (in 2D this means row-by-row when indexing as [y,x]).

Definition at line 458 of file RealFourierTransformation.cs.

Definition at line 458 of file RealFourierTransformation.cs.

void MathNet.Numerics.Transformations.RealFourierTransformation.TransformBackward ( double[]  fftReal1,
double[]  fftImag1,
double[]  fftReal2,
double[]  fftImag2,
out double[]  samples1,
out double[]  samples2 
)

Outplace Backward Transformation in one dimension for two vectors with the same length. Size must be Power of Two.

Parameters:
fftReal1 Real part of the first vector in frequency space. Length must be a power of two.
fftImag1 Imaginary part of the first vector in frequency space. Length must be a power of two.
fftReal2 Real part of the second vector in frequency space. Length must be a power of two.
fftImag2 Imaginary part of the second vector in frequency space. Length must be a power of two.
samples1 Output samples for the first vector.
samples2 Output samples for te second vector.

out double[]  fftReal,
out double[]  fftImag 
)

Outplace Forward Transformation in one dimension. Size must be Power of Two.

Parameters:
samples Real samples. Length must be a power of two.
fftReal Output of the sample set, real part.
fftImag Output of the sample set, imaginary part.

Definition at line 275 of file RealFourierTransformation.cs.

void MathNet.Numerics.Transformations.RealFourierTransformation.TransformForward ( double[]  samples,
out double[]  fftReal,
out double[]  fftImag,
params int[]  dimensionLengths 
)

Outplace Forward Transformation in multiple dimensions. Size must be Power of Two in each dimension. The Data is expected to be ordered such that the last index changes most rapidly (in 2D this means row-by-row when indexing as [y,x]).

Parameters:
samples Real samples. Length must be a power of two in each dimension.
fftReal Output of the sample set, real part.
fftImag Output of the sample set, imaginary part.
dimensionLengths Sizes, must be Power of Two in each dimension

Definition at line 417 of file RealFourierTransformation.cs.

void MathNet.Numerics.Transformations.RealFourierTransformation.TransformForward ( double[]  samples1,
double[]  samples2,
out double[]  fftReal1,
out double[]  fftImag1,
out double[]  fftReal2,
out double[]  fftImag2 
)

Outplace Forward Transformation in one dimension for two vectors with the same length. Size must be Power of Two.

Parameters:
samples1 Real samples. Length must be a power of two.
samples2 Real samples. Length must be a power of two.
fftReal1 Output for the first sample set, real part.
fftImag1 Output for the first sample set, imaginary part
fftReal2 Output for the second sample set, real part.
fftImag2 Output for the second sample set, imaginary part.

Definition at line 139 of file RealFourierTransformation.cs.

void MathNet.Numerics.Transformations.RealFourierTransformation.TransformForward ( double[]  samples,
out double[]  fftReal,
out double[]  fftImag,
params int[]  dimensionLengths 
)

Outplace Forward Transformation in multiple dimensions. Size must be Power of Two in each dimension. The Data is expected to be ordered such that the last index changes most rapidly (in 2D this means row-by-row when indexing as [y,x]).

Parameters:
samples Real samples. Length must be a power of two in each dimension.
fftReal Output of the sample set, real part.
fftImag Output of the sample set, imaginary part.
dimensionLengths Sizes, must be Power of Two in each dimension
